sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个名词均可表示"楼层"之意。
means: floor ： 指某一座高层建筑物的某一层。
storey ： 通常仅用以表示某一建筑的高度。

list.explanation: 把某人打得一败涂地，轻易地大败某人

example.en: That bum? The champ'll wipe up the floor with him.
example.zh: 那个家伙？冠军准会轻而易举地把他打得一败涂地。

example.en: Our team wiped the floor with the visiting team.

word_mean: 赋存在煤层之下的邻近岩层。

Sentence.sentence: Instead of a courtyard room, I'd like a room with a view, preferably on an upper floor.

Sentence.sentence: Like floor wax, the oil made the floors shiny and helped protect the wood.

Sentence.sentence: One day, Glenn Furst's mother put oil on the kitchen floor just before the inspector entered their house.

Sentence.sentence: The floors of all campus buildings are equipped with manual fire alarm systems which include fire alarm pull stations and pipes.

Sentence.sentence: They dropped off onto the floor.

sentences.cn: 这几个盆地的底部有沙漠、湖泊和沼泽。

sentences.cn: 那位代表嚷着要发言。

means.word_mean: 议员席；全体议员；全体与会者

sentences.en: The carpenter will floor this room with oak.
sentences.cn: 木匠将用橡木铺设这个房间的地板。

sentences.en: The soldier floored his attacker with one heavy blow.
sentences.cn: 士兵重重一拳, 把向他进攻的人打倒在地。

sentences.en: I was floored by his argument and had to admit defeat.
sentences.cn: 我被他驳倒了, 只得承认失败。

means.word_mean: 给…安装地板；给…铺设地面</seg>

jx.jx_en_mean: (of a speech or question) delivered by an individual member at a meeting, not by a representative on the platform
jx.jx_cn_mean: （讲话，提问）来自台下（观众，听众）

lj.lj_ly: questions from the floor will be invited.

jx.jx_en_mean: begin to dance on a dance floor
speak in a debate or assembly

entry.def: The floor of a room is the part of it that you walk on.

example.ex: Jack's sitting on the floor watching TV...
example.tran: 杰克正坐在地板上看电视。

example.ex: We painted the wooden floor with a white stain.
example.tran: 我们把木地板刷成了白色。

entry.def: A floor of a building is all the rooms that are on a particular level.

example.ex: It is on the fifth floor of the hospital...
They occupied the first two floors of the tower.
example.tran: 他们占用了塔楼的头两层。

entry.def: The ocean floor is the ground at the bottom of an ocean. The valley floor is the ground at the bottom of a valley.

example.ex: They spend hours feeding on the ocean floor.
example.tran: 它们花好几个小时在海底进食。

example.ex: ...a two-hour climb from the valley floor.
example.tran: 从谷底向上攀登两个小时

entry.def: The place where official debates and discussions are held, especially between members of parliament, is referred to as the floor .

example.ex: The issues were debated on the floor of the House.
example.tran: 这些问题在议院的议员席进行了讨论。

entry.def: In a debate or discussion, the floor is the people who are listening to the arguments being put forward but who are not among the main speakers.

example.ex: The president is taking questions from the floor.
example.tran: 总统正接受来自听众席的提问。

entry.def: The floor of a stock exchange is the large open area where trading is done.

example.ex: ...the dealing floor at Standard Chartered Bank.

entry.def: The floor in a place such as a club or disco is the area where people dance.
If you are floored by something, you are unable to respond to it because you are so surprised by it.

example.ex: He was floored by the announcement...
example.tran: 这个通告使他不知所措。

example.ex: He seemed floored by a string of scandals.
example.tran: 他似乎被一连串的丑闻搞得茫然失措。

entry.def: If someone is floored, especially in boxing, they are hit so hard that they fall over.
entry.tran: (尤指在拳击比赛中)打倒，击倒

example.ex: He was floored twice in the second round.
example.tran: 在第二轮中他两次被打倒在地。

entry.def: If you take the floor, you start speaking in a debate or discussion. If you are given the floor, you are allowed to do this.
entry.tran: (在辩论或讨论中)发言/给予…发言权

example.ex: Ministers took the floor to denounce the decision to suspend constitutional rule...
example.tran: 几位部长发言谴责暂停宪制的决定。

example.ex: Only members would be given the floor.
example.tran: 只有会员才拥有发言权。

entry.def: If you take to the floor, you start dancing at a dance or disco.

example.ex: The happy couple and their respective parents took to the floor.
example.tran: 这对幸福的新人和他们各自的父母在舞池中翩翩起舞。

entry.def: If you say that prices or sales have fallen through the floor, you mean that they have suddenly decreased.

example.ex: Property prices have dropped through the floor...
Last year, sales went through the floor.

entry.def: If you wipe the floor with someone, you defeat them completely in a competition or discussion.

example.ex: He could wipe the floor with the Prime Minister.

means.word_mean: 1. the inside lower horizontal surface (as of a room or hallway);

sentences.sentence: "they needed rugs to cover the bare floors"

means.word_mean: 2. structure consisting of a room or set of rooms comprising a single level of a multilevel building;
4. the ground on which people and animals move about;
5. the bottom surface of any a cave or lake etc.

sentences.sentence: "the whole floor complained about the lack of heat"

means.word_mean: 7. the parliamentary right to address an assembly;
8. the legislative hall where members debate and vote and conduct other business;

sentences.sentence: "there was a motion from the floor"

means.word_mean: 9. a large room in a stock exchange where the trading is done;
1. surprise greatly; knock someone's socks off;

sentences.sentence: "I was floored when I heard that I was promoted"

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English flōr, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch vloer and German Flur

sentences.cn: 还有工作室两间卧室各楼层.
sentences.en: There is also studio with two bedrooms on each floor.

sentences.cn: 我是楼层服务员.
sentences.en: I'm an attendant on this floor.

sentences.cn: 直到他到了自己的楼层, 他再没说话.
sentences.en: Without another word, he got off at his floor.

sentences.cn: 此机的楼层按钮及附有滚动式方向箭咀的楼层显示器都是原装安力的设备.
sentences.en: The floor buttons and the floor indicator with a scrolling direction arrow are original Elex equipment.

sentences.cn: 酒店装饰豪华典雅,设备先进, 拥有豪华客房300间,其中20层至23层特设为行政楼层.
sentences.en: In 23 floors modern style building covered 35, 000 sq.

sentences.cn: 最后, 在电梯到达目的楼层后判断电梯开门,离开电梯.
sentences.en: Finally, when the elevator the target floor thethe elevator door and leaves the elevator.

sentences.cn: 楼层: 4楼, 有电梯, 可接待外宾, 前台有发票.
sentences.en: Floor: 4 th floor, with elevator, can accommodate foreign guests, prospects have invoices.

sentences.cn: 商务楼层为商务人士提供豪华么人空间及各英专有设施及服务.
sentences.en: The luxurious Club Floors offer distinguished personalised service and deluxe amenities.

sentences.cn: 我们上了医院的电梯去某个楼层.
sentences.en: We boarded the hospital's elevator to go to the appropriate floor.

sentences.cn: 只要望一下楼层显示器,就可以见到运行速度有多快.
sentences.en: You can see how fast the lift travels with a glance at the floor indicator.

sentences.cn: 残疾人专用轮椅通可以道贯通整个苏格兰博物馆,包括公共厕所和通往所有楼层的电梯.
sentences.en: There is wheelchair access throughout the Museums including adapted toilets public lifts to all floors.

sentences.cn: 我不想让她当下一任楼层经理.
sentences.en: I want her not to be the next floor manager.

sentences.cn: 饭店拥有各类餐厅分设在三个楼层,装饰豪华、风格迥异.
sentences.en: The hotel has different restaurants arranging on three floors with magnificent decoration and different style.

sentences.cn: 对于住在较低楼层的居民, 从窗口逃生是可行的.
sentences.en: From the lower floors of buildings, escape through windows is possible.

sentences.cn: 这个楼层的存在只是为了证明女人是很难满足的.
sentences.en: This floor exists solely as proof that women are impossible to please.

sentences.cn: 对部门经理负责,具体实施对楼层的管理.
sentences.en: Assist the Dept. manager and manage the floor specifically.

sentences.cn: 中央旋转楼梯,壁炉周围的预赛两个楼层.
sentences.en: Central staircase rotates around the fireplace that heats both floors.

sentences.cn: 行政楼层接待处及行政酒廊的营业时间?
sentences.en: Executive Floor Reception Desk and Executive Lounge's business hours?

sentences.cn: 能不能调换一个楼层高一些的房间?
sentences.en: Would it be possible to change that to upper floors?

sentences.cn: 我是楼层服务员, 我能为您做些什么 吗 ?
sentences.en: I'm an attendant on this floor. What can I do for you?

sentences.cn: 今天在我们楼层吸尘的那个机器人明天将增加一些齿.
sentences.en: The robots that vacuum our floors today will be filling out teeth tomorrow.

sentences.cn: 在方格纸上画出成比例的楼层平面图，标出门和窗的位置。
sentences.en: Draw up a scale floor plan on squared paper, marking in the door opening and windows.

sentences.cn: 陨石坑底部到处是巨大石块.
sentences.en: Gigantic blocks of rock litter the crater floor.

sentences.cn: 柯克兰从汽艇的底部站了起来, 他的笑容消失了,随后眼神凶狠起来.
sentences.en: Cochran stared at him from the floor of the launch, his grin gone.

sentences.cn: 在经过4次还是5次的尝试之后我们只能到山谷的底部降落.
sentences.en: After 4 or 5 tries we went down to floor of the valley to land.

sentences.cn: 这艘船沉到了大洋底部.
sentences.en: The boat settled down on the ocean floor.

sentences.cn: 横梁上铺有芦苇、细泥和填土,底部以青砖墁铺.
sentences.en: The rafters are covered with mats and fine earth . The floor is paved with bricks.

sentences.cn: 实际上大洋的底部几乎象露出水面的陆地一样高低不平.
sentences.en: Actually the ocean floors are almost as irregular as the exposed land areas.

sentences.cn: 整个楼体, 全靠底部36根粗壮的木柱支撑.
sentences.en: The entire floor, body, entirely at the bottom of the 36 sturdy wooden pillars support.

sentences.cn: 在眼眶电脑断层摄影可见其内侧壁及底部骨头断裂.
sentences.en: Orbital CT scan revealed orbital medial wall and floor fractures.

sentences.cn: 杰克和斯特拉盯着笼子看,笼子的底部盖着木屑.
sentences.en: Jack and Stella stared into the cage with its floor covered in wood shavings.

sentences.cn: 窗户的底部与地板同高.
sentences.en: The bottom of the window is flush with the floor.

sentences.cn: 女性使用骨盆底部的肌肉来阻止尿液流出.
sentences.en: Women use the muscles of the pelvic floor to stem the flow of urine.

sentences.cn: 从树林顶端的鸟类与灵长目动物,到雨林底部的昆虫,都有最完整的呈现.
sentences.en: Featuring the birds and primates of the forest canopy and the insects of the forest floor.

sentences.cn: 这几个盆地的底部有沙漠 、 湖泊和沼泽.
sentences.en: On the floor of the basins lie deserts, lakes and swamps.

sentences.cn: 门的底部与地板接平无缝.
sentences.en: The bottom of the door is flush with the floor.

sentences.cn: 这似乎是以超出许多官员预期的速度给住房市场构建了一个“底部”.
sentences.en: That seems to have helped to put a floor under housing sooner than many officials expected.

sentences.cn: 反对党从政者在议院的议员席提出了抗议。
sentences.en: Opposition politicians registered their protest on the floor of the House.

sentences.cn: 这些问题在议院的议员席进行了讨论。
sentences.en: The issues were debated on the floor of the House.

sentences.cn: 下院议员席上的辩论常常是充满生气的.
sentences.en: Debate on the floor of the house is often lively.

sentences.cn: 议员席上不断有人在嘲讽和打岔.
sentences.en: There was constant jeering and interruption from the floor.

sentences.cn: 这些问题在议院的议员席进行了讨论。
sentences.en: The issues were debated on the floor of the House.

sentences.cn: 一端被嵌入墙内, 如铺地板的木料或横梁.
sentences.en: Architecture To be inserted at one end into a wall, as floor timber or beam.

sentences.cn: 他给房间铺地板.
sentences.en: He floored the room.

sentences.cn: 用竹子胶版做家具,天然漆布铺地板.
sentences.en: Bamboo plywood was used for the cabinetry and natural linoleum was used for the flooring.

sentences.cn: 我们计划用橡木材料给房间铺地板.
sentences.en: We planned to floor our room with oak.

sentences.cn: 他能彻底击败首相。
sentences.en: He could wipe the floor with the Prime Minister.

sentences.cn: 他在10分钟里彻底击败了比利.
sentences.en: He mopped the floor with Billy in ten minutes.

sentences.cn: 他们应该能击败任何竞争者.
sentences.en: They should be able to wipe the floor with any competitor.

sentences.cn: 毫无疑问, 我们的选手能把他击败.
sentences.en: There is no question about it, our man can mop the floor with him.

sentences.cn: 我被他的论证击败.
sentences.en: I was floored by his argument.

sentences.cn: 他期待能彻底击败他的对手.
sentences.en: He expected to mop the floor with his opponents.

sentences.cn: 象我们这样好的一个队应该能击败任何竞争者.
sentences.en: A team as good as ours should be able to mop the floor with any competitor.

sentences.cn: 我们被轻易地击败了。按理说我们本应该大败他们。
sentences.en: We got whacked. On paper we should have wiped the floor with them.

sentences.cn: 他能彻底击败首相。
sentences.en: He could wipe the floor with the Prime Minister.

sentences.cn: 在第二轮中他两次被打倒在地。
sentences.en: He was floored twice in the second round.

sentences.cn: 他一拳便将对手“打倒”在地.
sentences.en: He floored his opponent with one blow.

sentences.cn: 他在第一轮比赛中猛击一拳就把对手打倒在地.
sentences.en: He floored his opponent with a fine punch in the first round.

sentences.cn: 我一击把他打倒.
sentences.en: I floored him with a blow.

sentences.cn: 我打倒了袭击者, 却看见萨姆从地上滚过去.
sentences.en: I flung off my attacker, only to see Sam rolling across the floor.

sentences.cn: 拳击手朝对手猛扑过去并将他打倒在地.
sentences.en: The boxer tore into his opponent and floored him.

sentences.cn: 士兵重重一拳,把向他进攻的人打倒在地.
sentences.en: The soldier floored his attacker with one heavy blow.

sentences.cn: 他挥拳将安德鲁打倒在地。
sentences.en: He took a swipe at Andrew that deposited him on the floor.

sentences.cn: 在第二轮中他两次被打倒在地。
sentences.en: He was floored twice in the second round.

Sentence.sentence: Cracker Jacks has been gamifying its snack food by putting a small prize inside for more than 100 years, he adds, and the turn-ofthe- century steel magnate ( ' ,  巨头) Charles Schwab is said to have often come into his factory and written the number of tons of steel produced on the past shift on the factory floor, thus motivating the next shift of workers to beat the previous one.
